Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
divs: Sighting DetailsThe flashing in the sky caught my attention. I called to my son to look at it and at that time we noticed two objects. My wife and daughter noticed a third solid (non-flashing) object south of the two that were flashing. I thought the objects were floating with the air current until the two objects circled each other. A fourth object lower on the horizon was also flashing but it looked to have color red and blue. we watched for a little while and they faded away. We got about 2 or three minutes of video.
Summary: Looked like reflective sheet metal or or large white paper tumbling
trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Queen Creek
